turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: good afternoon, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I need help ordering pizza from Bella Luna Pizzeria, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I order four pizzas, all small, and all of them thin crust?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a veggie lover pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Second pizza, can I get a supreme pizza with everything on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The third pizza, can I get a chicken parm pizza, please?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And the fourth pizza, can I get meat lover's with extra pepperoni?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, it looks like bella luna does not have chicken parmesan. sorry about that. did you want another topping?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Does Bella Luna have barbecue chicken pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes they do.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take that instead, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. so it was 4 small pizzas, all with thin crust, 1 veggie lovers, 1 supreme, 1 bbq chicken, and 1 meat lovers with extra pepperoni.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that accurate?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $42.33 is the total, did you want me to place the order for pick up now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. i've placed the order, it'll b ready in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's about it. Thank you very much for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, enjoy.
